description: Number of inequivalent strong starters in cyclic group of order 2n+1.
references: CRC Handbook of Combinatorial Designs, 1996, p. 469.
W. L. Kocay et al., On strong starters in cyclic groups, Discrete Math., 56 (1985), 45-60.
Classification of starters, V. Linja-aho and P. R. J. Ostergard, J. Combin. Math. Combin. Comput. 75 (2010), 153-159.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Classification of starters, V. Linja-aho and P. R. J. Ostergard, J. Combin. Math. Combin. Comput. 75 (2010), 153-159.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Better definition from Vesa Linja-aho (vesa.linja-aho(AT)tkk.fi), Jul 31 2008
Corrected and extended by Vesa Linja-aho (vesa.linja-aho(AT)tkk.fi), May 06 2009
